I think that it is impossible not to note the fact that today we can see an obvious warming of the relations between China and Taiwan. Surely there is a great merit of the Taiwan president Ma Ying-jeou. He has said and he has done: direct charter flights have been started, Chinese tourists are welcome to visit Taiwan and the ROC's legislative restrictions on the financial sector to invest in Chinese economy are lifted.
